forumNotes.content:

but i need to know directory structure of your iso's , specially NT5 pe's .

and so on . just keep posting what you want to add specifically . and i (we) will try to answer.

@maanu  
many thanks for your further assistance  

" i suppose that you already have /know how to use grub4dos as dvd boot loader"   
Not really. So far I have always copy it and try to understand too much but try without it.  

structure of puppy  
puppy-431-de  

\[.\] BOOT.CAT INITRD.GZ LOGO.16   
\[..\] BOOT.MSG ISOLINUX.BIN PUP_431.SFS   
HELP.MSG ISOLINUX.CFG VMLINUZ   

default puppy  
display boot.msg  
prompt 1  
timeout 50  

F1 boot.msg  
F2 help.msg  

label puppy  
kernel vmlinuz  
append initrd=initrd.gz pmedia=cd pfix=copy   

Klaus
